amendatorysection.catchline: Crime Victim's Reparations Committee; created; members.
amendatorysection.para: A Crime Victim's Reparations Committee is hereby created. The committee shall consist of five members of the commission and two public members to be appointed by the Governor subject to approval by the Legislature. One public member shall represent charitable organizations, and one public member shall represent businesses. The members of the committee shall select a chairperson who is a member of the commission.
